summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNARS Afterglow Lip Shine is a comfortable lip gloss formula that effortlessly glides on mirror-like shine and hydrates lips for up to eight hours.
details: DetailsBenefitsSURREAL SHINE: Lightweight formula glides over lips imparting a sheer veil of color with a high-shine, mirror-like finish.GLIDES ON EFFORTLESSLY: Custom-designed applicator combines a flocked tip with a paddle shape to hug the curves of lips and deliver the desired amount of lustrous color.Key IngredientsPomegranate Flower Complex: a powerful blend of conditioning Jojoba Oil and antioxidant-rich Pomegranate Extract to nourish, soften, and protect lips from environmental stressors.Raspberry Seed Oil: a Vitamin E-infused oil, conditions lips to feel soft and smooth, leaving an irresistibly shiny finish.Research Results*Improves hydration instantly by +15%*Provides lasting hydration for eight hours100% felt the product glided on easily*100% felt the product gave lips a high-shine finish*97% felt it made their lips feel instantly softer and more supple*97% felt it made their lips feel instantly nourished and conditioned*Based on an independent study of 30 participants aged 18-45Item 2591164How To UseApply to bare lips for an effortless wash of color with high shine.Layer over other lip formulas to add dimension.Mix shades to create custom color effects.IngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Punica Granatum Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract , Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Bht, Tocopherol, Polyethylene, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Calcium Stearate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to bare lips for an effortless wash of color with high shine.Layer over other lip formulas to add dimension.Mix shades to create custom color effects.

reviews.headline: Love this lip gloss!!!
reviews.comments: I bought this for the first time and I absolutely love it! I have the color Nympho, and although the name cracks me up! The color is beautiful, and the feel is moisturizing! Yes it may need to be reapplied after an hour but that's okay. As long as it makes me look like i have lips again that's fine, the price is fair considering this is the best lip gloss I have found yet. Highly recommend this product! My only concern is that it won't always be around..so I will have to grab another tube soon!

reviews.headline: I need this in a speed stick!
reviews.comments: Love the shine but I feel like it needs to maybe come in a more compact design for speedy applications.

reviews.headline: NARS Gloss
reviews.comments: My faborite shade is Alister, but honestly all the shades are great

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: very pretty sheer pink gloss, feels amazing and moisturizing

reviews.headline: Pretty and smooth application
reviews.comments: Sticky yet pretty with a subtle pearl shine, smells good and applies smoothly

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments:
I have been buying Nars lip shine for years!
Not sticky and I love the color-Unbroken. 
Will continue to purchase. It looks and feels great!

reviews.headline: Perfect milky pink perfection
reviews.comments: Ok this is the most beautiful milky pink lip gloss! (Turkish Delight) pairs perfect with almost every nude lipstick and liner. The lip gloss also looks beautiful all on its own. I know some people say it wears off quickly but come on its a lip gloss so yes after a bit you have to reapply.

reviews.headline: Really beautiful product
reviews.comments: I love the color, not sticky. Beautiful hydrating feel and shine.

reviews.headline: It's okayâ€¦
reviews.comments:
It looks very beautiful on your lips, makes them soft, but wears off super fast. 
Also it left stains inside of my purse because some product somehow gets out between the lid and a bottle (doesn't leak). I never had this problem before with any other lip gloss.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: I was not a fan of the lipgloss , did not stay on good ðŸ™ƒ

reviews.headline: Surprising!!
reviews.comments: Love this!!! I was surprised by it but as I was looking at something else I was told about this product and what it could do and it was great!! I was worried that this was going to be like gloss; very sticky and I just don't do that. But I was shocked that it wasn't and it gave a nice color and made my lips look moisturized

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: I have used NARS lip gloss for years. It's the best! Good color and never sticky.

reviews.headline: Nympho, neutral beige
reviews.comments: Very attractive color, understated beige, and not sticky at all.  Creates a glow instead of a glassy shine.  I have several Nars products and the glosses are my favorites.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: I love this lip gloss. It is moisturizing without being sticky.

reviews.headline: My favorite gloss. Ever.
reviews.comments: I have probably spent no less than 2k on lip products and I must say this IS, HANDS DOWN, the BEST gloss ive ever had! Im super pale so i got several different shades and supervixen ended up being my favorite. Not sticky, sheer, and gorgeous pigment! 10/10

reviews.headline: My favorite gloss. Ever.
reviews.comments: I have probably spent no less than 2k on lip products and I must say this IS, HANDS DOWN, the BEST gloss ive ever had! Im super pale so i got several different shades and supervixen ended up being my favorite. Not sticky, sheer, and gorgeous pigment! 10/10

reviews.headline: Nice but very sheer
reviews.comments: Lip feel is nice but doesn't give much color.

reviews.headline: I'm undecided
reviews.comments: I love how this stays on but the color (tint) doesn't go on evenly.

reviews.headline: Ehhhhhhhh
reviews.comments: Wears off extremely quickly. Just sits on top of your lips. Dries them out. Beautiful color but i would not buy again.

reviews.headline: Too sheer
reviews.comments: It has very little color and not in a good way like a nude, its like a cakey goo that sits on your lips but not horribly sticky hence the 2 stars

faceoff_positive.comments: NARS Afterglow Lip Shine Lip Gloss is very smooth and shiny.Long lasting and beautiful color of Aragon glows just right.My makeup routine needs this just amazing.
faceoff_positive.headline: Nars Afterglow

faceoff_negative.comments: I was so excited to try this but was very disappointed. I bought Aragon and loved the color but this literally doesn't stay on your lips long at all. A stick of Juicy Fruit gum lasts longer than this, dead serious. Not worth the money.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not Worth the Money
